name: AudioScheduledSourceNode.onended
description: The onended event handler for the AudioScheduledSourceNode interface specifies an EventHandler to be executed when the ended event occurs on the node. This event is sent to the node when the concrete interface (such as AudioBufferSourceNode, OscillatorNode, or ConstantSourceNode) determines that it has stopped playing.

refs.name: Web Audio API
refs.description: The definition of 'onended' in the 'Web Audio API' specification.
